connect20/ifuturz_productvideo.name: connect20/Ifuturz_Productvideo

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/ifuturz_productvideo.description: This extension adds the facility to manage your videos associated with Magento products in the same way you manage the images from the Magento admin panel.
